name: Fark Theme Unfucker (v3.0-RELEASE)
description:
Fark changed their CSS again (and again (and again))
    *** Still Not Over It ***

...so I have reimplemented some of the more important parts
of the classic style, and heavily modified the rest of the layout
for high readability and efficient use of screen-space.
additional_info:
Screenshots are now *mildly* out of date, though it's close.
I will update them soon.

ChangeLog:
  3.0-RELEASE - all known bugs fixed!
  3.0RC3 - Ok, got many of the more important post-new-theme fixes in, starting to look pretty good
  3.0RC2 - OMGHUGE font workaround for the comment areas added
  3.0RC1 - WTF THEY'RE UPDATING *NOW*?! ***releases what I have, unfinished***
  2.1 - minor bugfixes, font-hack though @import from GWF suggested
  2.0 - bugs fixed

I've also trimmed and condensed the header/footer of
the page fairly significantly, as the fark header seems
be slowly pushing the start-of-comments downwards.

** untested without AdBlockPlus, but I suspect it's not an issue as   **
** I set all the advert elements do "display: none !important" anyway **

*** Requires fonts: Ubuntu, Iconsolata ***
*** (view the CSS source for notes on that issue) ***

If for some strange reason somebody is annoyed
and wants the "2.1" version that was previously here,
it has been backed-up here:
    https://gist.github.com/3106809
